# Terms by Chapter

## Chapter 2 Terms

```{r}
library(pander)
section1.2 <- read.csv("~/R project/LDAGlossary/csv/Section1-2.csv", header=TRUE,
                       na.strings=c("."), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
table1.2 <- cbind(section1.2[1], section1.2[2])
names(table1.2) <- c("Term", "Definition")
pander(table1.2)
```
